WITH ShortCreationTable(shortdate) AS (
SELECT CONVERT(DATE, SUBSTRING(creation_date, 1,10)) AS shortdate
FROM master_transaction.t_interaction
), DistinctDateTable (distinctdate) AS (
SELECT DISTINCT shortdate as distinctdate
FROM ShortCreationTable
)
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY distinctdate ASC) AS period_id, 
distinctdate as period,
YEAR(distinctdate) as year,
MONTH(distinctdate) as month
FROM DistinctDateTable;
